panels.description:
Busy state of all CPU cores together

https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/blob/main/receiver/hostmetricsreceiver/internal/scraper/cpuscraper/documentation.md

targets.expr: (sum by(host_name) (irate(system_cpu_time{host_name="${host}",service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state!="idle"}[5m])) / on(host_name) group_left sum by (host_name)((irate(system_cpu_time{host_name="${host}",service_namespace="${service_namespace}"}[5m])))) * 100

panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description:
Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)

https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/blob/main/receiver/hostmetricsreceiver/internal/scraper/loadscraper/documentation.md
panels.title: Sys Load (5m avg)

panels.description:
Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)

https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/blob/main/receiver/hostmetricsreceiver/internal/scraper/loadscraper/documentation.md
panels.title: Sys Load (15m avg)

targets.expr:
(
  sum(system_memory_usage{host_name="${host}", service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state="used"}) 
  / 
 ( sum(system_memory_usage{host_name="${host}", service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state="free"}) + sum(system_memory_usage{host_name="${host}", service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state="used"}))
)
*100

(
  sum(system_paging_usage{host_name="${host}", service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state="used"}) 
  / 
 ( sum(system_paging_usage{host_name="${host}", service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state="free"}) + sum(system_paging_usage{host_name="${host}", service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state="used"}))
)
*100

(
  sum(system_filesystem_usage{host_name="${host}", service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state="used"}) 
  / 
 ( sum(system_filesystem_usage{host_name="${host}", service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state="free"}) + sum(system_filesystem_usage{host_name="${host}", service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state="used"}))
)
*100

sum by(host_name) (irate(system_cpu_time{host_name="${host}",service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state="system"}[5m])) / on(host_name) group_left sum by (host_name)((irate(system_cpu_time{host_name="${host}",service_namespace="${service_namespace}"}[5m])))

sum by(host_name) (irate(system_cpu_time{host_name="${host}",service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state="user"}[5m])) / on(host_name) group_left sum by (host_name)((irate(system_cpu_time{host_name="${host}",service_namespace="${service_namespace}"}[5m])))

sum by(host_name) (irate(system_cpu_time{host_name="${host}",service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state="wait"}[5m])) / on(host_name) group_left sum by (host_name)((irate(system_cpu_time{host_name="${host}",service_namespace="${service_namespace}"}[5m])))

sum by(host_name) (irate(system_cpu_time{host_name="${host}",service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state=~".*irq"}[5m])) / on(host_name) group_left sum by (host_name)((irate(system_cpu_time{host_name="${host}",service_namespace="${service_namespace}"}[5m])))

sum by(host_name) (irate(system_cpu_time{host_name="${host}",service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state!~".*irq", state!="idle", state!="user", state!="wait", state!="system"}[5m])) / on(host_name) group_left sum by (host_name)((irate(system_cpu_time{host_name="${host}",service_namespace="${service_namespace}"}[5m])))

sum by(host_name) (irate(system_cpu_time{host_name="${host}",service_namespace="${service_namespace}", state="idle"}[5m])) / on(host_name) group_left sum by (host_name)((irate(system_cpu_time{host_name="${host}",service_namespace="${service_namespace}"}[5m])))

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

panels.description: Disk space used of all filesystems mounted
panels.title: Disk Space Used Basic

matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen
Iowait - Waiting for I/O to complete
Nice - Niced processes executing in user mode
Steal - Time spent in other operating systems when running in a virtualized environment
System - Processes executing in kernel mode
User - Normal processes executing in user mode
Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working
